title: Tank Fizz has the durability of a tank, the damage of a bruiser, and the mobility of an Assassin.

replies.body:
Ap Fizz too.

Tank Fizz isn't problem because Fizz is problem!

nah fizz is not the problem. The problem is that people dont know how to play agunist fizz. Like blitz fizz capitlizes of mistakes his enemy makes. fizz is easy to kill you just need to use CC at the right time and he is dunzo

>Fizz is easy to kill you just need to use CC at the right time 

This works both ways.
If beating Fizz means knowing when to use CC.
Then winning as Fizz means knowing when to Dodge CC.
Having recently picked up fizz, Yes. Yes it does. I only use my e for a guaranteed kill if my flash is up, a thresh lantern is down, or there is no one to retaliate for using it. E saves lives.
Lol.Fizz main detected?
bingo good sir

AP Fizz has way lower tankyness and sustained damage.

Not to mention that Top CancerFish is way harder to punish earlygame and build against thanks to mixed damage. 

Both get more or less the same amount of CDR atm.

Sto pplease. Dont mention tank fizz before fking riot ''buffs'' his AP ratios while lowering his base..


Pls no

Riot1: players complain that fizz is a problem
Riot2: really Fizz? when was the last time we even saw him in na lcs? you sure you ain't drunk?
Riot1: yes, apparently our players use tank fizz and is very strong
Riot2: hmm, tank fizz, stronger than zed?
Riot1: yes mi'lord
Riot2: ok, then lets nerf his base stats
Riot1: will do sir
Riot2: but he uses to do some flashy players a few years ago. You know what, give him a ap ratio buffs as compensation
Riot1: roger that

{{champion:105}} : QW Fish, EAA Fish... Q Fish .... E Fish .... Q PENTA FISH
caster: AND HE STILL DIDN'T USE HIS ULTIMATE, CAN YOU BELIEVE IT? SUCH AN AMAZING PLAY
Fizz is bullshit. That said, he doesn't have the durability of a tank.
It's more like the durability of Tank Ekko with troll pole on top of it.

except ekko has....... 

a speed boost, a slow, a 3 hit damage nuke, another slow, a stun, missing health damage, 2 dashes, untargetability, healing, escape, and heavy aoe damage. On an assassin.

... And?

My comment wasn't about how tank Fizz compares to tank Ekko overall, it was how durable they were in raw stats, as the person I am replying to was mentioning that tank Fizz is not as durable as a real tank. Ekko and Fizz, who both have assassin-appropriate base defensive stats and scaling, are about equal in raw durability when they build tank, which is nowhere near the level of defenses that dedicated tanks have.

You're gonna blow both of them up a lot easier than a real tank... if you can catch them, anyway.

No. Ekko has a defensive steroid (shield), A self heal (ult), much more mobility and stick potential, better team utility CC (slows for days and more active stuns than fizz).

Ekko was an issue as a tank because his kit had enough utility and damage for it to work, while having the benefits of an assassin. Fizz does *not* have anywhere near Ekko's durability nor utility as a tank. The only feasible way tank Fizz could possibly be a problem is if his W does too much damage. Even then, Fizz can be peeled, CC locked, and dealt with properly by an ADC. Fizz lacks innate sustained damage and utility, so if he doesnt combo the carry, he will die. Meaning he needs to use E to go in, leaving him 0 escapes. Ekko still has R as a fallback that stacks with his resistances.
He's only invulnerable every 5 seconds come late game during a fight. He definitely doesn't have an insane amount of built-in survivability /s
While I hate fizz as much as the next guy, the fact that he isn't tearing up the pro scene just tells me we all have more to learn. Still hate fizz tho.

> While I hate fizz as much as the next guy, the fact that he isn't tearing up the pro scene just tells me we all have more to learn. Still hate fizz tho.

fun fact, the only time fizz tore up the pro scene was when people wouldn't stop complaining about him and riot gave him a damage ramp on his ult that proced both AD and AP damage. even then he was only played tank. No professional player actually plays regular assassin fizz. Because the pro players are smart enough to not stand under his pole.
Didn't faker play AP fizz against RNG during the MSI?

Irelia has the durability of a tank, the damage an **assassin**, and the mobility of an Assassin.

lol

{{champion:236}} 

The damage of an assassin, the mobility of an assassin, and the tilting power of a {{champion:17}}

Not so hot on the durability side of things, though.

Also, stating that someone has the damage and mobility of an assassin makes a very poor case to make them seem op :P
You also forgot tank ekko that has all that coupled with the utility of a support

and the utillity of a minion...
Also, he only has the damage of a bruiser if he goes for a bruiser built, which means he has not the durabillity of a tank. And if he goes full tank, he also has the damage of a tank, with high mobillity rather than utillity.

> [{quoted}](name=Don Pavoni,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AWJxgA9X,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-05-25T20:21:31.559+0000)
>
> and the utillity of a minion...
> Also, he only has the damage of a bruiser if he goes for a bruiser built, which means he has not the durabillity of a tank. 

I have seen a Fizz with Iceborn and Sunfire and 0 AP kill a squishy in under 2 seconds. Repeatedly. Even when built full tank, he does enough damage that you have to have someone sit back and wait to peel him off your carries the moment he goes in, just like you would for an assassin. Fizz's base damage is too high, both for Tank Fizz and AP Fizz. Fix it Rito.
probably because he's ahead? Ability damage increases with levels so if he's very ahead of course his base damages +iceborn will kill people quickly if they are squishy and low leveled.

Fizz' abilities in particular are enhanced by his ult, it's not just that he's ahead but he can effectively increase his base damage by quite a bit using his ult. Of course, dodging it is imperative against fizz but then %missing hp damage on his autos... seriously if there was at least 2 items that gave attack speed and tanky stats, tank vayne would be a thing.
I'd also get to play Nocturne more too ;-;

> [{quoted}](name=Wimbledofy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AWJxgA9X,comment-id=000500000000,timestamp=2016-05-25T22:02:25.296+0000)
>
> probably because he's ahead? Ability damage increases with levels so if he's very ahead of course his base damages +iceborn will kill people quickly if they are squishy and low leveled.

How do you think he gets ahead? Fact is, pretty much no one can duel a tank Fizz. He simply does too much damage for how much tankiness he gets from items. If you know of a champion that can duel Sunfire Fizz, I'd love to hear it. Because I have yet to find one.
I mean tbh I haven't seen a lot of fizz's recently but since my main adc is sivir I've never really had much trouble against fizz's when I do see them.
Honestly, Sivir is less prone to dramatic casters since she can spell shield something. Most casters, that means 1/3 of their damage just poofs.

Assume the said Fizz is at lvl 11
Q 40 + AD
W 20 direct + 20 DOT + 4% missing health
E 270
Iceborn  100% AD
Sunfire 25
R 200 + 20% of all of the above

Totally ~970 dmg + 4% missing = ~ 700 after MR

I don't know any squishy that squishy, a typical adc should have ~ 1500 HP at lvl 11. 700 is barely half.
Tank Fizz maxes W first.

On-demand AoE slow? Skillshot-slow and AoE knockup? He has an insane amount of utility for an assassin. 

Also please, he has a huge amount of built-in survivability with his E. ANY character with that skill would be a nightmare to catch, kill or respond against. Fizz apologists are the first to forget this skill exists for some reason.
Dodging is essential to an assassin's kit.

Oh this is very broken. A champion that has tank build, AOE stun, and free AP. Crazy broken. Literally an ALL STAT champion. However, this is only "ideal" because I and anyone that knows what they are doing, knows that a veigar without AP is useless. And since you're suppose to ignore tanks, a tanky veigar is twice as useless when I play against him.
This is the reason for the rabadons. If you stack well enough, you can still get 700 ap because of the multiplier and you can still blow people up easily.

You have 2,687 health with that build at level 18. You're not tanky at all, and you have 700 AP. Veigar tank is useless. It all sounds good on paper, but that's because you're under the impression that because veigar has that build suddenly he can be compared to a Garen, or Ekko tank. No. Tanks usually have around 3800 health minimum. 

You'd probably die more as veigar tank, since you get more health at level 18 with the AP build. And you'd do more damage, to kill the enemy faster, all while you stay in the back line. And you still put out the same amount of utility AOE stun to do it.

If you want more health than change the build. I only have two health items in this anyways. you could very easily throw a {{item:3143}} in there for IBG and {{item:3060}}  instead of zzrot for a little more damage too. You say it is an only on-paper build but it has worked for me so far.

Yeah, ignore the tank that will still one-shot your carries.
A GOOD Veigar player will laugh at you ignoring him and burst half your team down.

But he won't. because he's weak without AP items. lol don't you get that? That's why he has his AP passive, because items aren't enough to make up for how much AP he needs to be a viable champion. Tank veigar is at a disadvantage for veigar.

He can still stack AP without items, a LOT easier than before.
Oh, and his ult is now an execute, on top of the free AP he's been getting.
While I do agree building tank on midlane Veigar is bad, it's actually not terrible for Support Veigar (even though that, in itself, is iffy against certain teamcomps).

Good thing we have Super Galaxy Cancer skin coming out so we'll get to see plenty more of him in the future too! 

It's like cancer, but from space!

Fun fact, even at high plat level I saw a tank fizz get shut down top lane and then come back and LITERALLY 1v5 our team while doing by far the most damage on the enemy team. Something's gotta give, Riot.

Tank Ekko has the durability of a tank, the damage of a bruiser, and the mobility of an Assassin.

or

Tank Akali has the durability of a tank, the damage of a bruiser, and the mobility of an Assassin.

or

Tank Shaco has the durability of a tank, the damage of a bruiser, and the mobility of an Assassin.

etc
GUT HIS FREE ZHONYAS
